services.overview: Contractor-support logistics company specializing in hauling, jobsite services, materials movement, and remote-access support. Intentionally structured to operate in both commercial and government environments.

core_services.name: Equipment Transport
core_services.description: Pick up and deliver rental equipment, move customer-owned equipment between yards and jobsites, handle urgent same-day and remote-access hauls

core_services.name: Jobsite Services
core_services.description: Deliver, position, maintain, and retrieve owned equipment such as light towers, generators, fuel cubes, and portable site gear. Perform small on-site logistical tasks.

core_services.name: Materials Delivery
core_services.description: Pick up and deliver building materials from suppliers. Provide contractor overflow hauling when they lack time, trucks, or staff.

core_services.name: Waste & Container Services
core_services.description: Deliver and retrieve dumpsters or debris boxes. Transport debris to approved disposal sites.
